scripts.test:
nightwatch -c test/nightwatch.json || echo 'If you havent downloaded the jar yet, try 
$ npm run selenium:download'
scripts.selenium:download: ls  || curl http://selenium-release.storage.googleapis.com/3.0/selenium-server-standalone-3.0.1.jar > selenium-server-standalone.jar && ls chromedriver.zip || curl http://chromedriver.storage.googleapis.com/2.9/chromedriver_mac32.zip > chromedriver.zip; unzip chromedriver.zip
